str_footer_terms16: To upload Content to this Website, you must be either a Verified Uploader, a Content Partner or a Model, save and except if such Content is limited to comments, a cover picture and/or an avatar. Failure to comply with these Terms of Service or any related contracts you will enter into with us, or should we determine that any of the statements above is untrue, or not complied with, we may, in our sole discretion, refuse to include the Content or any part thereof or any references to such Content on this Website, remove the Content in question from this Website, forfeit all accrued or pending earnings, cancel all current or pending payouts, terminate your account and take any measures necessary to minimize or eliminate any liability.  We may, in our sole discretion, terminate your account if you breach any of the Terms of Service or at any time for any reason even without cause.  If we believe that your Content violates any criminal laws, this Website’s Terms of Service, your account will immediately be terminated, you will be banned from this Website without notice with all earnings and payouts forfeited, and where applicable, we will report you to law enforcement authorities  Obligation to comply with Records Keeping Requirements under 18 U.S.C. §2257.  You certify that the Content you upload to this Website has been produced and records are being kept in accordance with 18 U.S.C. § 2257 et. seq., as modified from time to time, with the rules and regulations set forth in 28 C.F.R. § 75 et. seq., as modified from time to time, and any other applicable records keeping or age verification laws. Upon our request, you shall promptly deliver us legible copies (as may be lawfully redacted), of valid (as of the date of production of the Content) recognizable governmental photo identifications for any or all individuals appearing in any or all of your Content (demonstrating that each were at least 18 years of age on the day the Content was produced) together with the required identification forms, documents and releases. In this context, when we refer to all individuals appearing in the Content, we mean, without limitation, filmed, photographed, or recorded individuals or individuals in any way in the Content, whether appearing nude, semi-nude or fully clothed, engaging in simulated or actual sexual intercourse (including solo scenes). We do not accept or accommodate voice over or sounds from persons less than 18 years of age appearing in the background or synced with the Content whether featured or not. Your failure to promptly deliver the requested information upon request, may lead to the temporary or permanent suspension of your account. You will, at your own expense, indemnify, defend, and hold us harmless from, any and all liabilities, losses, damages, fines, fees, penalties, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys’ fees) incurred or suffered by us from any claim arising or resulting from your failure or negligence to comply with maintenance of any legally mandated records.  You acknowledge that you are solely responsible for the activity that occurs on your account. str_footer_ncc12: 为了帮助保护平台的完整性，我们还禁止包含以下内容的内容，包括虚构的、模拟的或动画的：
str_footer_ncc13: ● 描述未经同意的性行为*，包括强迫性行为、强奸或性侵犯；
str_footer_ncc14: ● 表现出吸毒、丧失行为能力或醉酒**并参与性行为的人；
str_footer_ncc15: ● 任何形式的“深度伪造”（操纵某人的形象，无论是图片还是视频，以欺骗或误导观看者相信该人正在以所呈现的方式行事或说话，缺乏艺术价值）。
str_footer_ncc16: * 请参阅下面有关敏感主题和同意注意事项的部分。

str_footer_ncc18: 敏感主题和同意注意事项
str_footer_ncc19: 重要的是要记住，色情作品并不总是代表日常生活中典型的性互动和行为，并且经常描绘由业余爱好者和专业人士同意的各种幻想和角色扮演场景。
str_footer_ncc20: ● 咒语、催眠或附身：我们不允许出现以下内容：
str_footer_ncc21: ● 表演者被描述为丧失行为能力，或因附体、咒语或催眠而完全失去知觉；
str_footer_ncc22: ● 表演者在表演中或表演后表现出痛苦或恐慌的迹象；
str_footer_ncc23: ● 真实地描绘了着迷、催眠或着魔的表演者从事或遭受性行为的情况。
str_footer_ncc24: ● 睡眠：如果内容中有睡眠成分，则该人必须在任何性行为开始后的合理时间内醒来，并且必须得到该人的明确同意。
str_footer_ncc25: ● 束缚和束缚：如果场景中使用了堵嘴、束缚或其他装置，导致表演者无法清晰地说话或移动，则必须从材料本身中明确地确定是否同意继续参与
str_footer_ncc26: ● 地下幻想：必须通过清晰的口头或视觉提示从材料本身来确定是否同意
str_footer_ncc27: 需要明确的是，我们关于这些敏感主题的规则并不是对这些性表达形式的判断，而是旨在明确我们平台上可以接受或不可以接受的内容，以维护一个安全的社区。
str_footer_ncc29: 我们坚定不移地致力于保护用户的安全。
